doc:
Yael Stone https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Yael_Stone 0 Yael Stone (born 6 March 1985) is an Australian actress. She has worked extensively in Australian theatre and has won two Sydney Theatre Awards. Outside of Australian theatre, she is best known for her portrayal of Lorna Morello in the Netflix series Orange Is the New Black. Stone is also known for her support of abortion rights and has vocally advocated for women's issues. Yael_Stone ( born 6_March_1985 ) is an_Australian_actress . She has_worked extensively in Australian_theatre and has_won two_Sydney_Theatre_Awards . Outside of Australian_theatre , she is_best_known for her_portrayal of Lorna_Morello in the_Netflix_series_Orange Is the_New_Black .
